name: Monferno
flavorText:
To intimidate attackers, it
stretches the fire on its tail
to make itself appear bigger.

previous.name: Chimchar
previous.flavorText:
It agilely scales sheer cliffs to
live atop craggy mountains. Its
fire is put out when it sleeps.

next.name: Infernape
next.flavorText:
It uses a special kind of martial
arts involving all its limbs.
Its fire never goes out.
